_header: Peter of Petra may be tane [taken]
Subjects: Peter, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Peter in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
Peter of petra may be taneIn latine leid þat is a
                    stane…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…And lad it in grawe as was skillto do sa worthy relyk
                    till

         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.5-14.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.7-28.
